lyrics:
Maisha yangu usalama mkononi mwako
Nakuhitaji wewe tu, umetosha
Sitaogopa chochote ushafika mbele yangu
Ninaye Mwanga

Baba niongoze, nilinde
Hadi unaponitaka
Ee Baba niwezeshe, nishikilie
Hadi nimalize safari

Umenipangia mema, mema Tumaini la baadaye nilipate

Hamna heri na kusaka mali ya dunia
Hazina yangu iwe kwako
Nitakufuata milele, moyo wangu wakutamani
Nasitatosheka

Baba niongoze, nilinde
Hadi unaponitaka
Ee Baba niwezeshe, nishikilie
Hadi nimalize safari

Umenipangia mema, mema Tumaini la baadaye nilipate

Tumaini langu ni kwako
Nakutazamia, nategemea, nakukimbilia

Umenipangia mema, mema Tumaini la baadaye nilipate
Aiya yeah yeah yeah yeah, oooyah
Welcome to Kenya, this is my jamdown

[Intro: Nadia & Arrow Bwoy]
Uuuuu uuuh Nadia
Them call me arrowbwoy oooye

[Verse 1: Nadia Mukami]
I never met, someone like you before
I never felt, something  like this before
Mwenye upole, tena si mwenye hasira
Anipende mi mwenyewe
Tena awe na subira

[Pre-Chorus: Nadia Mukami]
Put my baby on replay, give my baby some dancing shoes
Put my baby on replay, playing my favorite tune

[Chorus: Nadia Mukami]
Oya cheza Radio love, oooh oh Radio Love
DJ cheza Radio Love, ooh oh Radio Love
Chini kwa chini Radio Love, oooh oh Radio Love
Cheza Radio Love, oooh oh Radio Love

[Verse 2: Arrow Bwoy]
My baby love, my sweetie chocolate-oh
Somebody locate wakinitega nianguke naomba uniokote eeeh
You already know issa dancing time
Cheza na wakati kangoma kako fire yah
Mtoto uko fire yah
[Pre-Chorus: Arrow Bwoy & Nadia Mukami]
Ah! Put my baby on a replay
(ayayah)
Give my baby some dancing shoes
(ooooh oh)
Put my baby baby on a replay (ayayah)
Cheza radio Love (aah ah)

[Chorus: Nadia Mukami & Arrow Bwoy]
Oya cheza Radio love, oooh oh Radio Love
DJ cheza Radio Love, ooh oh Radio Love
Chini kwa chini Radio Love, oooh oh Radio Love
Cheza Radio Love, oooh oh Radio Love


[Nadia Mukami]
Naona nikipita na yeye, ukicheza Radio love
Nyumbani mi niende na yeye, ukicheza Radio Love

[Arrow Bwoy]
Ouuuh naona nikipita na wewe eeeh mmh
Juu wallahi nimechizi na wewe
Oooh yeah

[Nadia Mukami]
Kiuno changu shaky shaky (wewe)
Ukicheza Radio Love
Tonighty we are messy messy (oooh)
Nipe Radio Love
[Chorus: Nadia Mukami]
Oya cheza Radio love, oooh oh Radio Love
DJ cheza Radio Love, ooh oh Radio Love
Chini kwa chini Radio Love, oooh oh Radio Love
Cheza Radio Love, oooh oh Radio Love

Oya cheza Radio love, oooh oh Radio Love
DJ cheza Radio Love, ooh oh Radio Love
Chini kwa chini Radio Love, oooh oh Radio Love
Cheza Radio Love, oooh oh Radio Love

[Outro: Nadia Mukami]
Chini kwa chini na yeye
Anipakate nimpakate
Baby we, baby wee
Nikupe Radio Love
We cheza Radio Love
